data.title: great donuts!
data.text: The donuts here melt in your mouth.   Donuts are fresh made.  Tuesday is special price for a dozen of donuts.   they also have sandwiches daily.

data.title: Small and Easily missed
data.text: We have donuts here about once a month--super yummy, best donuts I have had!  very Small, easily missed location, SUPER nice folks running it!  Eat Local!!

data.title: The donuts are great but location is difficult.
data.text: While the donuts are great the location is difficult to find parking and a tad scary walking in.  In front of the store front is only the width of a thin sidewalk before there are cars flying by you with four lanes plus a few turning lanes each way.  I was a tad scared walking with my 7 year-old that listens.  I probably wouldn't try it with my 3 year-old.
